title: 2020 Ford F-150 XL Pickup Truck
item_description:
2020 Ford F-150 XL Pickup Truck

Removal Note: This lot can only be removed on Monday, November 25th, 2024, from 9:00 AM to 3:30 PM. Earlier or later times will not be permitted.

Specifications

  • Year: 2020
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: F-150 XL
  • VIN: 1FTEX1CPXLKE64597
  • License: 98056A3
    • Registration Expiration: 8/31/2024
  • Odometer Reads: 80,724 (updated 11/18/2024 during preview) 
    • 79,662 (MILEAGE WILL CHANGE after smog)
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 6500 Lbs
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Engine: 2.7L V6
  • Body Style: Truck
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 265/70R17
  • Deck Length: 97”
  • Deck Width: 65”
  • Wall Height: 21”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Four Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Gray
  • Features:
    • Backup Camera
    • Bluetooth Hands-Free
    • Cruise Control
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows
    • Power Mirrors
    • Steering Wheel Controls
    • Trailer Hitch
    • Air Conditioning
    • Bed Liner
    • Bed Mounted Toolboxes
  • Ladder not included

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, Smog Certificate, Death Certificate, and Transfer without Probate will be mailed 2-3 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
